title: Founderâ€™s Associate (f/m/x)
content:
Become part of Tanso and leverage your recruiting expertise for climate impact.
Join our team to take an active role in helping companies to decarbonize effectively and start your career in a fast-growing environment. Your main objective is to keep Tanso running smoothly & growing at the same time.
As our Founder's Associate to the CEO, youâ€™re helping us to run the organization and build and continuously improve our company processes. Youâ€™re taking full responsibility for all activities in Tansoâ€™s Ops & Finance world, while working with our CEO to strategically develop and grow Tanso.
How you succeed
ðŸ“ˆ Make sure we run as a company

Own our operations & finance function. Run everything from strategy to buildings tables for new joiners.

ðŸŽ¯ Build Tanso further

Implement key processes. Prepare Tanso to scale and be ready for Series A+.
Make being data-driven your mission. Use your analytical strength and data-savvyness to embed data into every inch of Tanso.

ðŸ§¯Be the right hand to the CEO

Be the fire extinguisher. Jump into the trench wherever needed. Work on the topics that are business critical and leave your footprint all around Tanso.
Work on special projects. Together with Till, be wherever our strategy needs you and own key projects end-to-end.

Whom you will be working with

Till (CEO), who is running all commercial aspects of Tanso
Gyri (CPO) & Lorenz (CTO), the rest of our founding team
Literally everyone at Tanso 

Recruitment Process

Culture & Personal Fit with Saskia - get to know Tanso and ask all your questions
Role Introduction with Mauritz - understand your role
Founder Interview with Till - get a feeling for what it would be to work at Tanso
Team lunch - get to know your future colleagues
Offer - the start of your journey with Tanso

 
 
Job Requirements
P.S.: You're wondering why there isn't a list of concrete skill requirements in the job description? We believe it's more important that you are excited about the role and want to grow with it, instead of fulfilling some specific high-level requirements. We think there can be numerous different paths that could qualify you for this role, and we want to hear YOUR story.
However, to ensure we can communicate effectively with our customers, your language proficiency in German should be at least level C1 or higher.

questions.label: Why do you want to join Tanso
What skills and experiences will you be able to leverage when tackling the challenges that you will face in your role at Tanso?
Is there something else that you want us to know?
Are you legally authorized to work in the European Union?
Do you speak German? If yes, on what level (A1-C2)?
Did anyone refer or recommend you for this position (please add the full name or an email address)?
